title: Floral Polki Kundan Jhumka Earrings - Pushyaragam Touch
materials: Freshwater Pearls. Crafted with Hyderabadi polish for a lasting luster.
features: Floral design showcasing uncut Polki diamonds arranged around a central ruby, creating a blooming effect. The earrings are delicately edged with a fine line of smaller diamonds. A drop of round mint green hydro bead with freshwater pearls completes this piece with a playful touch.
occasions: and contemporary events. Also perfect for a half-saree function.
description: This exquisite piece blends the timeless appeal of Polki diamonds with a fresh floral design, making it a unique addition to your jewelry collection. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a rich and lasting shine. The pop of mint green gives a modern twist while the Polki diamonds provide a traditional South Indian appeal.
